page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN BROOK
page.content: It is{essential}for the locals of Brook to have some kind of transport. The nearest town is 4 miles away and there is nowhere in Brook for people to shop.There are{3 bus services running through Brook,they can take the locals to Freshwatwer,Ventnor and Newport.Most of the residents however, own a {car.} The people of Brook only need to make 3 journeys a week,at the most,to do their shopping and they feel that a car is just as cheap to run as travelling by the public transport system.
